intro: Bromus karlobagensis, commonly known as the Karlobagen grass, is a perennial grass species native to the high-altitude regions of the Tibetan Plateau. Bromus karlobagensis is often found in rocky soils and alpine meadows, where it plays a role in stabilizing soil and supporting local biodiversity.
